text: Epirotic cuisine (Greek: Ηπειρώτικη κουζίνα or Κουζίνα της Ηπείρου) is the traditional Greek cuisine of the region of Epirus. It is based mostly on dairy products; butter and various cheeses.Epirus cuisine ==Appetizers and cheeses== Metsovone cheese * Anthotyros * Feta * Galotyri * Kaskavali * Kefalograviera * Kefalotyri * Metsovone and Metsovela from Metsovo * Tyrogliata * Ourda cheese ==Dishes/Specialities== *Many types of pites (pies) including Kasiopita (Kikitsopita), Kothropita, Kimadopita, Pepéki, Kasiata and Blatsariá * Hilopites * Frog legs * Kontosouvli * Loukaniko * Trahanas ==Desserts/drinks== * Spoon sweets * Klostari * Flogera (Metsovo) * Greek wine ==References== ==External links== *Greek gastronomy *Gastrotourismos Category:Greek cuisine Category:Epirus (region)
title: Epirotic cuisine
